input_text:
Job Title: Okta SME | HYBRID

Location: District of Columbia, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Customer Service, Information Technology

Description:
Dignari is a forward-thinking, human-centered, emerging technology and analytics company that builds solutions to transform business. We’re a woman owned company where diversity is applauded and success is celebrated. 
We are seeking a Okta SME to support our growing portfolio of programs. In this role, you will work as the technical lead and subject matter expert for a Federal government system using Okta solutions as the core technology.
POSITION RESPONSIBILITIESArchitect, design, install, integrate, configure, and deploy ICAM solution capabilities using Okta solutions.Support program goals and objectives leveraging expert Okta experience and skills.Integrate Okta with other third-party software, such as SailPoint, Radiant Logic and other government systems relying on data from the system.Proven track record of delivering high quality and consistent systems and environments for development teams.Performs highly specialized and technical tasks associated with the most current and cutting-edge technologies.

POSITION REQUIREMENTS10+ years in technology roles with a focus on ICAM, agile software development, or digital transformation projects. Prior leadership experience in a similar capacity is essential.Must hold current certifications including Microsoft Azure certification, Okta Certified Administrator, and Okta Certified Professional.Experience integrating Okta into Microsoft Azure infrastructure as a service.Experience with integrating Okta with other third-party software, such as Radiant Logic, SailPoint and other government systems relying on data from the system.Proven track record of delivering high quality and consistent systems and environments for development teams.Performs highly specialized and technical tasks associated with the most current and cutting-edge technologies.Coordinates with program management and customer to ensure the problems have been properly defined and the solutions satisfy customer needs.Communicates with customers and teammates clearly and concisely.Maintains current knowledge of relevant technology as assigned and may have supervisory responsibilities.Developing documentation on new or existing systems.Strong written, verbal and presentation skills.Experience leading cross-functional projects from conception to launch.A track record of taking initiative and being resourceful to accomplish ambitious goals.Effective organizational skills and ability to juggle many competing priorities.Ability to establish and maintain client relationships with internal and external clients. Roll-up your sleeves attitude to tackle projects large and small and a collaborative, low-ego approach to collaborating across the organization.

We believe in taking care of our employees. As a #Dignarian, you will have access to robust and competitive benefits and the flexibility to choose what works best for you. You also get all the benefits of a small company including direct access to leadership, a vibrant and personal culture and the ability for your voice to not only be heard but to make a real difference in the company’s direction.
Dignari is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.

Experience Level (if available): Director

output_json.title: Okta SME | HYBRID

Support program goals and objectives leveraging expert Okta experience and skills.
Integrate Okta with other third-party software.
Proven track record of delivering high quality and consistent systems and environments for development teams.
Performs highly specialized and technical tasks associated with the most current and cutting-edge technologies.
Coordinates with program management and customer to ensure the problems have been properly defined and the solutions satisfy customer needs.
Communicates with customers and teammates clearly and concisely.
benefits: flexibility to choose what works best for you
all the benefits of a small company including direct access to leadership
